column5: Anyone with any experience fishing Quebec about an hour north of the Ottawa river we will cross into Quebec at Pembroke Ontario Fishing the first week of August for smallies, walleye, pike and lake trout
Are you going in to Jim's Lake?
going to Summerville Lake and others, staying at the "Pontiac Lodge aka Pontiac Game Club
I am not familiar with that location or lake but you can follow most any mid-summer tactics and catch fish. At that time of year think deeper water and slower presentations.
Is there not as good of fishing in Quebec as other provinces? Doenst seem to be much discussion of Quebec
Best answered by McQ in the following thread...https://www.walleyecentral.com/dc/dcb...3989&mode=full
